item.description:
Join in any time you like! We had a great hopping time last time! This is co-posted with Social Fun & Fun with Alcohol.

A Pub Hop is British for pub crawl. Or should we make it a Pub TROT?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L9nXfffeAIU

(When Monty Python's Holy Grail first came out, people would trot around from place to place in Harvard Sq. clapping coconuts... or rattling empty cassette tape boxes.)

Please wear UNIQUE HATS indoors. That is how you will find each other. Repeat, please wear hats indoors..! These will be your fellow meetup people. Please bring CASH if you can.

--4:00 Charlies Kitchen. If rain, meet upstairs indoors.

--5:00 Russell House Tavern, --NEW--downstairs area.

http://www.russellhousecambridge.com/

--6:00 Grendels Den, --they have an amazing half price menu for apps and food, with the purchase of a $3.50 drink (special good from 5:00 until 7:30).

But get to Grendels early at 5:00 if you want to order food. LATER IT WILL BE CROWDED. Lauren (Event co-host) will be there to try & help you grab seats.

http://www.grendelsden.com/menu/halfprice.h...

--7:00 Pizzeria Uno's on JFK St. Downstairs there is a full bar. Also upstairs you can order pizza but it will be busy. If you do get table(s) together.

--8:00 John Harvards on Dunster St. They brew their own beer, and you can order beer flights (a sampler) for the same price as a draft. Look for RESERVED TABLES in the back.

We will not always be seated because we like to mingle! PLEASE BRING CASH! PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB. Parking is available at the Charles Hotel Parking garage. Public transit, red line T (recommended).
item.name: Unique Hats Pub Hop--Harvard Sq.
